title: Bitfinex launches ‘implied volatility’ perpetual futures for Bitcoin and Ether
description: Bitfinex users can now make bets on how fast or how slow Bitcoin and Ether are expected to move in a 30-day period.

title: SHIB Millionaire Splits Shiba Inu Bags To Join New Cryptocurrency
description: The journey of the SHIB millionaire, from consolidating wealth through Shiba Inu (SHIB) to diversifying with Shiba Budz (BUDZ), illustrates a strategic evolution in crypto investment philosophy.

title: Ethena’s ENA Token Soars 80% Since Launch, Now a Top 100 Crypto Asset Amid Defi Buzz

title: Mining giant Bitfarms $240M investment to triple capabilities for Bitcoin halving
description: Bitfarms Ltd., a leading global Bitcoin mining company, has announced a substantial investment of nearly $240 million to upgrade its mining equipment. This strategic decision aims to triple the company’s hash rate post-Bitcoin halving in 2024, underscoring its commitment to enhancing performance and profitability in the evolving digital currency landscape. title: CoinGecko: Bitcoin rose by 3,230% on average after each halving
description: CoinGecko analysts found that, on average, the value of Bitcoin skyrocketed following the coin's previous halving cycles.

title: CoinGecko: Meme coin narratives gain 1,313% during Q1

title: KuCoin Bitcoin balances drop over 20% following DOJ lawsuit
